public class Toolbar
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.VerticalPanel

The toolbar displayed on the shared screen at the bottom that allows the native cursor of the shared screen device to enable/disable functionalities and gives it some extra power

Author:
Oliver Schmid

Method Detail

isDiscloseNotes

public boolean isDiscloseNotes()
Returns:
true if the notes are disclosed false otherwise (also used for newly created notes to define their initial state)

Returns:

isTextInputEnabled

public boolean isTextInputEnabled()
Returns:
true if remote users can create new notes / enter text, false otherwise.
